Creation

of / just

Emit variable amount of values in a sequence and then emits a complete notification.

from

Turn an array, promise, or iterable into an observable.

Description

  • of(10, 20, 'any', 'value', true, [1, 2, 3], {})

    10

    20

    'any'

    'value'

    true

    [1, 2, 3]

    {}
